context: Soon the Programmable Piezoelectric synaptic transceiver Bio-Chip implants will be complete and none of this will matter.
How about having a feature that allowed us to restrict all calls, emails, and texts to only those in our contacts.

replies.context: For Iphone: Go to settings, then phone, then set the "Silence Unknown Callers" to "On". That at least silences all the spam callers.

context:
The thing that drives me crazy with my Samsung Android phone is this:
THE SCREEN TURNS OFF WHILE I AM USING THE PHONE AND I CANNOT KEEP IT ON. Even when it is plugged in, it turns off. Makes the phone unusable when it is needed most. NOTHING works to stop this turnoff behavior.

replies.context: ....there is a adjustment to keep the screen on as long as you choose.....

replies.context: No, these articles are already targeting  extremely basic users....you'll just have to figure it out.

context: Hmm, I couldn't seem to find the setting to block 'Kim Komando'...Oh well, I'll keep looking...
